name: library-v3
description: This is an early attempt at creating the new TG academy library project. The main requirements of the project are: - Responsive UI (iPhone 6 and desktop at a minimum) with >= 90% accessibility score on Lighthouse - Display books (eg table, cards) dynamically populated from array of book objects, with pagination - Ability to add a book, modify an existing book, delete a book, and find books by title and/or author - Form input validation with jQuery, user interaction testing with Cypress, and unit testing with Jest - HTTP requests set up for all GET, PUT, POST and DELETE operations, with canonical response handling - Node/Express RESTful API with MongoDB/Mongoose handle HTTP requests and CRUD operations
author: stuart yates
